feat: Refactor atoms to mirror shadcn docs structure with native MDX

Major refactoring to align the atoms showcase with shadcn/ui documentation patterns while maintaining native Next.js MDX (no fumadocs dependency).

## Breaking Changes
- Renamed route from `/atom` to `/atoms` for consistency
- Migrated to catch-all route pattern `[[...slug]]`
- Moved MDX content from `app/[lang]/atom/*/page.mdx` to `content/atoms/*.mdx`

## New Features
- Dynamic routing with `generateStaticParams` for static generation
- Automatic metadata generation from MDX frontmatter
- Table of contents extraction from heading structure
- Prev/next navigation between atoms
- Frontmatter support (title, description, category, tags, dates)
- Shadcn-style layout with sidebar and header navigation

## New Files
- `src/lib/atoms-utils.ts` - Helper functions for metadata, navigation, ToC
- `src/app/[lang]/atoms/[[...slug]]/page.tsx` - Dynamic atom page component
- `src/app/[lang]/atoms/layout.tsx` - Atoms section layout
- `src/app/[lang]/atoms/page.tsx` - Atoms landing page
- `content/atoms/` - MDX content directory
- `content/atoms/infinite-slider.mdx` - Sample atom documentation

## Shadcn Components Added
- `src/components/docs-breadcrumb.tsx` - Breadcrumb navigation
- `src/components/docs-copy-page.tsx` - Copy page functionality
- `src/components/docs-sidebar.tsx` - Docs sidebar component
- `src/components/docs-toc.tsx` - Table of contents component
- `src/lib/source.ts` - Source loader (placeholder for future fumadocs)
- `src/lib/docs.ts` - Docs configuration
- `src/lib/flags.ts` - Feature flags

## Updated Files
- `src/components/template/sidebar-01/atoms-config.ts` - Updated hrefs to /atoms
- `src/components/template/header-01/main-nav.tsx` - Updated navigation links
- `src/components/template/header-01/constants.ts` - Updated main nav config

## Dependencies
- Added `gray-matter@4.0.3` for frontmatter parsing

## Technical Implementation
- Uses native Next.js MDX instead of fumadocs
- Manual navigation configuration (simpler, more control)
- Custom ToC extraction from MDX content
- Metadata extraction via gray-matter
- Responsive layout matching shadcn patterns

## Migration Path
All atoms now follow this structure:
```mdx
---
title: Component Name
description: Brief description
category: Animation | Interactive | Layout
tags: [tag1, tag2]
publishedAt: 2024-11-09
featured: true
---
# Content here
```

## Next Steps
Create additional MDX files in `content/atoms/` and add to `atoms-config.ts`
